div.p: Purity of remotely prepared states in phase space. The phase space of the prepared states is spanned by S rp and γ rp. The gray area marks squeezing below the vacuum limit. The color code indicates the purity μ of the remotely prepared states. The optimal point is marked by the white star. The inset shows the Wigner function 1/ e contours of the experimental state at the optimal point with μ = 0.54 and a pure squeezed state with the same squeezing level. The vacuum 1/ e contour is indicated in gray
